body.content:
*FROM THE DESK OF MRS. MADELINE GENESISBRANCH MANAGER OFCITIBANK OLCUNITED
KINGDOM Attn: DearThanks for your response and willingness to participate
in this transaction. The name of my bank is CitiBank Plc United Kingdom UK.
I am happy as well to know that we can do this together for our mutual
interest.I shall send you the deposit certificate in my next email. This
transaction requires utmost trust from your side, since you will be
receiving the funds in your account and shall be in control of everything,
until I come to your country for my share and investment project. Regarding
the sharing, since I am the initiator of this transaction I deserve to take
a higher percentage, so I propose to share the money with you 40% for you
and 60% for me. Let me know your thoughts on this, because it is my wish
for both parties to be happy.I want you to bear one thing in mind, there is
no risk involved in this transaction. It is 100% risk free and secured. It
involves bank to bank wire transfer to your bank account or we can also use
the means of a diplomatic system once the funds are granted and released to
us. I shall take care of every information related to the account once the
transfer is concluded. The first step now in this transaction, is to place
your name as the next of kin to the account in the bank system database so
that every information we receive reflects accordingly as the next of kin
to mr saeed. I will require you to send me the following information for
the commencement of the process, your full names, your age, postal address,
telephone, fax numbers and a Scan copy of your identity document as I have
done in my first message to you to be sure whom i am dealing with. This has
to be done immediately. This transaction will be complete within 5-8
working days and the funds will be transferred to your bank account.Once I
receive the above mentioned information and conclude with the arrangements,
the services of a very good attorney we are required to represent you in
the affected offices for the claim here in my bank CitiBank Plc London. I
have a very good lawyer in mind, he specializes in such cases and is also a
registered attorney with the CitiBank of United Kingdom London, which is
the bank that handles the transfer of funds out of the country to your bank
account.As far as my bank is concerned, I will handle my part. I shall send
you the lawyer's contact details once I receive the requested information
from you, so that you can contact him and request for his services. Here is
a little more about me, I am a widower with one daughter Name of my
daughter is Sharon, 9 years old, It has been my dream to manage my own
business and I think God has answered my prayers by making this transaction
possible for me and you. Tell me more about yourself, family and your
business. Please, contact me strictly on this my personal email address and
remember to treat this transaction with utmost confidentiality.I await your
urgent response. Thank you and God bless.May Peace be upon you and your
familyAwait Your Urgent Response to proceedBest Regards,Madeline Genesis.*

header.subject: FROM THE DESK OF MRS. MADELINE GENESIS
